name: undersigned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the people whose signatures appear below in the text, usually at the end of a formal letter: We, the undersigned, strongly object to the closure of St. Mary's Hospital: Dr Jack James, Dr Margaret Curry, Hugh Edwards.

Add to word list
the people whose signatures appear below, usually at the end of a formal letter: We, the undersigned, wish to protest the planned closing of the local library.
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a document, the person or people who have signed at the end the document to say that they agree with its contents: We, the undersigned, demand the immediate repeal of these fees.
